21.m: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come. - 2 Corinthians 5:17 (ESV)

l.q: What does it mean to be a new creation?
l.a: When we are in Christ, we become a new creation. It is already the love of Christ that controls us, and not anymore our sinful passions.

l.q: How did God reconcile the world to Himself?
l.a: Through Christ, God reconciled us to Himself. Christ became the ultimate sacrifice for us, so that our sins will no longer be counted against us.

l.q: What does it mean to be an ambassador for Christ?
l.a: To be an ambassador is to represent someone. To be an ambassador for Christ means to model to other people Christ's love for us. We can share the gospel to them, we can care for them and do good works. We can forgive them of their sins against us just as Christ exemplified.

21.p: Thank you, Lord Jesus. Each day that I wake up I have already been forgiven and freed from the bondage of sin and death. Your mercies are new every morning, and each day I wake up with hope in my heart. Thank you for your redeeming love. May you grant me the grace to be a good testimony of your love to others too.
